processing_structure.text: Specify input and output (one integer, sum of its divisors)
Check if the number divides evenly (n % i == 0)
If divisible, add i to the sum

advice.text: Run your program and check outputs for simple inputs like 1, 6, and 28.
Manually trace the loop for a number (e.g., n=6) to see which i values are added and confirm the expected total.
Verify edge cases: test n=1, a prime number, and n=0 or negative; if behavior is unexpected, add input checks or handle those cases and re-test.
